import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom" export default function BlogDetails(props){ const post = props.post console.log(post) return(

{post.title}

By {post.author} on {post.category}

Posted on {post.date}

{post.content}

{ post.tags.map((tag,index) =>{ return {`#${tag}`} }) }
) }
